unnormalised: It's important to note that outbreaks of diseases like Dengue and Chikungunya often peak during the monsoon season (July-Sept). Taking preventative measures such as eliminating standing water in containers (flower pots, tires, etc.) can significantly reduce mosquito breeding. Remember to use mosquito repellent containing DEET, esp during the day. For reliable info on public health advisories, check the MoHFW website, or contact your local municipal corporation helpline, like the BMC helpline 1916 in Mumbai. Don't ignore symptoms like high fever, joint pain; consult a Dr. immediately.
normalised: It is important to note that outbreaks of diseases like Dengue and Chikungunya often peak during the monsoon season (July to September). Taking preventative measures such as eliminating standing water in containers (flower pots, tires, etcetera) can significantly reduce mosquito breeding. Remember to use mosquito repellent containing D-E-E-T, especially during the day. For reliable info on public health advisories, check the M-o-H-F-W website, or contact your local municipal corporation helpline, like the B-M-C helpline one thousand nine hundred and sixteen in Mumbai. Do not ignore symptoms like high fever, joint pain; consult a Doctor immediately.
